entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 30S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
